Grave Chill.name: Grave Chill
Grave Chill.fullText:
Soul Reaper Attack 11Grave Chill

When the dead fall, you speed their souls to the Shadowfell.

Encounter        Divine, Implement
Immediate Reaction      Ranged 5

Trigger: An ally within range of you bloodies an enemy with an attack

Primary Target: The triggering ally

Effect: You shift to a square adjacent to the target and make a burst 1 attack.

  Secondary Target: Each enemy in the burst

  Attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Fortitude

  Hit: The target is dazed and immobilized until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 63.
Grave Chill.flavor: When the dead fall, you speed their souls to the Shadowfell.
Grave Chill.trigger: An ally within range of you bloodies an enemy with an attack
Grave Chill.effect: You shift to a square adjacent to the target and make a burst 1 attack.
Grave Chill.attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Fortitude
Grave Chill.onHit: The target is dazed and immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Call of Letherna.name: Call of Letherna
Call of Letherna.fullText:
Soul Reaper Attack 20Call of Letherna

A frigid wind moans as it swirls around you, bringing with it the malign atmosphere found only in the Raven Queen’s demesne.

Daily        Cold, Divine, Implement, Necrotic, Zone
Standard Action      Close burst 5

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 4d6 + Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and you pull the target 4 squares.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The burst creates a zone of killing cold that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone is slowed until the end of its next turn, and it takes 10 cold and necrotic damage.

Sustain Minor: The zone persists, and you pull each enemy within the zone 1 square toward the origin of the zone’s burst.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 63.
Call of Letherna.flavor: A frigid wind moans as it swirls around you, bringing with it the malign atmosphere found only in the Raven Queen’s demesne.
Call of Letherna.attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will
Call of Letherna.onHit: 4d6 + Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and you pull the target 4 squares.
Call of Letherna.effect: The burst creates a zone of killing cold that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone is slowed until the end of its next turn, and it takes 10 cold and necrotic damage.
Call of Letherna.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you pull each enemy within the zone 1 square toward the origin of the zone’s burst.
Call of Letherna.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Fated Outcome.name: Fated Outcome
Fated Outcome.fullText:
Soul Reaper Utility 12Fated Outcome

All has been foreseen because each outcome has already unfolded in the Raven Queen’s eyes.

Encounter        Divine
Immediate Interrupt      Ranged 10

Trigger: One ally within range of you misses on an attack roll, fails a saving throw, or fails a skill check.

Effect: The ally rerolls the attack roll, the saving throw, or the skill check, adding your Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier to it.

Special: When you gain this power, choose Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use with this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 380, page(s) 63.
Fated Outcome.flavor: All has been foreseen because each outcome has already unfolded in the Raven Queen’s eyes.
Fated Outcome.trigger: One ally within range of you misses on an attack roll, fails a saving throw, or fails a skill check.
Fated Outcome.effect: The ally rerolls the attack roll, the saving throw, or the skill check, adding your Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier to it.
Fated Outcome.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use with this power.
